revised_title: Thermodynamics of Mixed Crystals of Ammonium Chloride and Ammonium Bromide
tldr: The authors measured the heat capacity of mixed crystals of ammonium chloride and ammonium bromide with different compositions, finding that the heat capacity in the solid solutions is higher than that of the pure salts. The study provides insights into the phase diagram of the ammonium-chloride-ammonium-bromide system and helps evaluate the entropy changes associated with the gradual transitions in these solids.
